EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Website_Open Data Platform Contact Us.Confirmation Email - Retro
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in the Open Data Platform
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for your interest in the Open Data Platform. We wanted to let you know that we have updated the FAQ <http://opendataplatform.org/OpenDataPlatformInitiative_FAQ.pdf> online to answer many of the questions we are hearing from the industry. We will also continue to share information through the opendataplatform.org <http://opendataplatform.org/> website so please keep checking back for more information.
Best, The Open Data Platform Team
